column4: Would somebody help me with a question about killing both parent and child processes please. See http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1372445
try killing the child process first, then kill its parent process...
What commands do you use to "try killing the child process first, then kill its parent process"? Thanks!
each process, parent and child, will have it's own pid (use ps ax too find them). Then kill them using e.g. sudo kill -TERM <pid>....
